Text:
This series, when aired in WS HDTV (AR 16:9 or 1.78), like on the Cartoon network, is actually a cropped version of the original "anamorphic" AR of 2.35 (as seen on SkyHD). If you'd like to see all 22 episodes of Season 1 at near 720p (1280x544) beautifully ripped from Bluray, in the original 2.35 AR, then visit this page (UJ dld links listed and comparative Bluray/HDTV screen grabs shown and commented):
http://www.dl4all.com/movies/tv-shows/205180-star-wars-the-clone-wars-season-1-720p-bluray.html
Watching the Bluray rips after the HDTV is like seeing the episodes for the first time. A real eye-opener, worth every bit of bandwidth.
Yeah I watched this a week ago.  Get 2040's releases if you want to watch a week early.
